adudecalledleo.lionutils.block

Class ProperHorizontalFacingBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.block.AbstractBlock
      • net.minecraft.block.Block
        • net.minecraft.block.HorizontalFacingBlock
          • adudecalledleo.lionutils.block.ProperHorizontalFacingBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.item.ItemConvertible

    public class ProperHorizontalFacingBlock
extends net.minecraft.block.HorizontalFacingBlock
    Block that faces one of four cardinal directions. Facing property is HorizontalFacingBlock.FACING.

    Unlike HorizontalFacingBlock, this appends the property to the block and automatically configures the placement state.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    See Also:
    HorizontalFacingBlock
